text: Amato Ferrari (born 18 April 1966) is an Italian former auto racing driver. After competing in national events in Italy and Great Britain, he retired from racing in 1994 at the relatively young age of 28. Staying in motorsport, he switched to the management side of the sport. He is currently team principal of his own AF Corse team. ==External links== * www.afcorse.it Official website * Amato Ferrari at driver database. title: Amato Ferrari
